Country:Location:JOB RESPONSIBILITIES:The candidate will be part of Carrier-Transicold Business, working with dynamic cross functional global development team performing embedded systems firmware design and development for our next generation refrigeration system products.Individual must have the ability to understand system requirements, understand system architecture, prepare design & code using C&C++, perform unit and system testing.The selected candidate must have a background in embedded software development with strong coding skills, devices/system interaction and troubleshooting, and will be involved in all aspects of the product development process (concept, design, implementation, validation, verification, compliance and production).The selected candidate will interact frequently with project management both locally and globally. Proven expertise in all aspects of Product development process, right from conceptualization to field deployment to support
Strong in Embedded C/C++
Experience on non-OS(bare metal) and Real Time OS based system designs
Hands on Development experience with serial communications including CAN, LIN, RS232, SPI, I2C, USB, RS485 – at least one
Experience on 8/16 / 32 bit Microcontrollers
Must have experience in Debugging, Troubleshooting Embedded systems using Emulators, JTAG\BDM Debuggers etc
Architecture, Design and Documentation of Embedded Systems Software
Hands on Object Oriented Analysis and Design (OOAD).
Work closely with systems, hardware, validation/reliability and manufacturing engineering disciplines
Able to understand hardware design and schematics at high level

Understanding of the software development life cycle and processes(Water fall, Agile)Other Competencies
Understanding of the entire system development process.
Strong English communication skills - oral and written.

Passionate about building high-quality systems with software development best practices.
